titles: A lamentable ballad on the Earl of Essex's death. Tune is, Essex last goodnight.
publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,
notes: Verse: "All you that cry O hone, O hone ..."
An edition of: "A lamentable new ballad upon the earle of Essex death", first published ca. 1635.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereux, --  Earl of, 1566-1601 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
